name: Security Risk Assessment
title: Security Risk Assessment
task: Conduct a comprehensive security risk assessment for systems and applications.
goal: Identify vulnerabilities and threats to implement appropriate security controls.
details: Include threat modeling, vulnerability scanning, and risk prioritization.

name: Incident Response Plan
title: Incident Response Plan
task: Develop an incident response plan for security breaches and threats.
goal: Ensure rapid and effective response to security incidents.
details: Include response procedures, communication protocols, and recovery strategies.

name: Security Policy Development
title: Security Policy Development
task: Create comprehensive security policies and procedures for the organization.
goal: Establish clear security guidelines and compliance requirements.
details: Include access controls, data protection, and employee training requirements.

name: Penetration Testing
title: Penetration Testing
task: Perform penetration testing to identify security weaknesses.
goal: Validate security controls and identify exploitable vulnerabilities.
details: Include testing methodology, exploitation techniques, and remediation recommendations.

name: Security Awareness Training
title: Security Awareness Training
task: Design and deliver security awareness training for employees.
goal: Educate staff on security best practices and threat recognition.
details: Include training content, delivery methods, and effectiveness measurement.
